lines: Kuumuna mulu syomo muli nguwe ndikale;
Ndilizi taku mapenzi kuti Jesu kaliko;
Ndilizi taku mapenzi kuti Jesu kaliko.
Mu luse lwakwe ndazunda mujwi lyakwe ndayuma;
Nendiwa mu lwendo lwangu, Nakuba ndanetuka
Ndila nywa menda abuumi, Kuzwa mu Bbwe lyakale,
Ndila nywa menda abuumi, Kuzwa mu Bbwe lyakale.
Ula ndipa kulyokezya, Mu munzi wakwa Taata,
Olu lwiimbo lwangu lyoonse, Jesu wakanditola
Olu lwiimbo lwangu lyoonse, Jesu wakanditola.
